00013         mint Calendar::epochSeconds() {
00014                 return std::time(NULL);
00015         }
00016         
00017         mint Calendar::epochDays() {
00018                 return (mint) std::floor((mfloat) (std::time(NULL) / 86400));
00019         }
00020         
00021         maven::Date* Calendar::now() {
00022                 maven::Date* d = new maven::Date();
00023                 time_t rawtime;
00024                 time(&rawtime);
00025                 struct tm* timeinfo = localtime(&rawtime);
00026                 d->year = timeinfo->tm_year + 1900;
00027                 d->month = timeinfo->tm_mon;
00028                 d->day = timeinfo->tm_mday;
00029                 d->hour = timeinfo->tm_hour;
00030                 d->minute = timeinfo->tm_min;
00031                 d->second = timeinfo->tm_sec;
00032                 return d;
00033         }
00034         
00035         mdouble Calendar::runtime() {
00036                 return (mdouble) clock() / (mdouble) CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00037         }
